pageProduct.name: White Glo Charcoal Deep Stain Remover Strips 7 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

White Glo Charcoal Deep Stain Remover Activated Charcoal Strips can remove up to 10 years of stain in 7 days.

This kit contains 7 powerful, charcoal infused strips, that mould to the shape of your teeth without slipping or sliding. Strong enough to allow you to talk and drink during treatment.


- Activated charcoal penetrates and draws our stubborn stains.


- Removes stains caused by coffee smoking, wine and general aging.


- Non-slip strips offer a secure and comfortable fit to teeth.


- Enamel safe & peroxide-free.


Remove up to 10 years of surface stains in just seven days with long lasting results.


A whiter smile starts here:


7 charcoal infused strips.


Easy application.


Peroxide free.


Enamel safe. Peroxide free.

Boxed Contents: 7 whitening treatments: Each with 1 upper and 1 lower strip

Size: 7 Pack

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children. Do not use by children under 12 years of age. Do not swallow plastic strips. Non Slip strips are designed to hold well to teeth. Do not use on loose teeth. restoration or braces. Avoid contract with eyes. Rinse immediately if product comes into contact with eyes. Rinse mouth thoroughly after use. Do not use when there is damage, abraded or sensitive gums, or poor oral health.

Ingredients

PVP, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Glycerin, Alcohol, Activated Charcoal Powder, Sodium Chlorite, Dissodium EDTA, Stevioside, Menthol.

Directions

1. Peel/apply. 2. Wait. 3. Rinse/smile. See instructions inside for more information.
